body: @mythmon Should the files to be deployed be built during the `compile` phase, or the `test` phase? If the build fails in the `compile` phase it will fail the whole run, whereas if they're built in the `test` phase it will continue to run other tests.
body_text: @mythmon Should the files to be deployed be built during the compile phase, or the test phase? If the build fails in the compile phase it will fail the whole run, whereas if they're built in the test phase it will continue to run other tests.
body_html: @mythmon Should the files to be deployed be built during the compile phase, or the test phase? If the build fails in the compile phase it will fail the whole run, whereas if they're built in the test phase it will continue to run other tests.
